entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • x86 Interop Call stack incorrect when stopped in native exception filter #105116
  • Mono Wasm - System.Tests.ArrayTests.Copy_SZArray #105093
  • 'System.Net.NameResolution.Functional.Tests' Failure #105092
  • `process.MainModule` throws `Win32Exception` instead of `InvalidOperationException` when process has exited in some cases #105090
    Future
  • Possible typos in `PackedSpanHelpers` #105088
    Future
  • JIT: `StaysWithinManagedObject` should be able to handle more cloned loops patterns #105087
    9.0.0
  • Starting a .NET process with CreateProcessW using lpApplicationName ends up in messed up commandline args #105085
  • JIT: potential GC hole with collectible code in delegate #105082
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Investigate whether strength reduction can have more complete support for `Span<T>` patterns #105080
    10.0.0
  • Profiling problem on armv7l #105070
    9.0.0
  • On Android, DateTime.ToString("F") or ("f") returns the wrong result in Japanese locale #105097
  • "error MSB1008: Es darf nur ein Projekt angegeben werden" while trying to compile .net 8.0.7 #105067
  • Avoid duplicating comparison instructions when it can be solved by just reordering the flag-setting instructions #105065
  • unsafe struct fails with primitive field only when at the end of the sequence #105064
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Bind` To `UdpClient` #105060
  • UdpClient set `ExclusiveAddressUse` fail #105056
  • [API Proposal]: BitwiseAtomic<T> #105054
    Future

Closed

  • HttpClientFactory support for keyed DI #89755
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc sampling #102895
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Suboptimal block layout with loops exiting to returns #105083
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.CounterSampleCalculatorTests.CounterSampleCalculator_ElapsedTime #102429
  • BinaryFormatter exception in ConfigurationManager when accessing non-existing key #104914
    9.0.0
  • LocalFileSettingsProviderTests.GetPropertyValues_NotStoredProperty_ValueEqualsNull failing sporadically in CI #29429
    Future
  • Higher Memory Usage for the EventSource Class #99816
    9.0.0
  • JIT: LowerHWIntrinsicGetElement can reorder trees unsafely #89565
    9.0.0
  • No-op incremental libs build spends most of the time in compiling asn files #105077
  • [External] Libunwind has suppressed warnings #90359
    9.0.0
  • GetSpecialFolder on macOS returns incorrect folder locations #100440
    9.0.0
  • [WPF] System.Management 8.0.0 - Scrolling using stylus does not work anymore when using ManagementClass.GetInstances() #103640
  • The job running on agent NetCore-Public ran longer than the maximum time #104044
  • "Optimizing assemblies for size failed" - Core 9 Preview 6 Maui Mac Catalyst Build #104945
    9.0.0
  • X509Certificate2.GetCertContentType undocumented behaviour on Windows #105076
    Future
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl depends on deprecated version of System.Security.AccessControl #104047
  • Metrics for System.Runtime #85372
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.AiaTests.AiaAcceptsCertTypesAndIgnoresNonCertTypes #103879
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.Kill_EntireProcessTree_True_CalledByNonLocalProcess_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #88976
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.BinaryReaderTests #93743
    9.0.0
  • System.TypeLoadException from static field #100950
    9.0.0
  • Static field in value type with empty generic causes `TypeLoadException` #88030
    Future
  • `TypeLoadException` when using a struct containing a static `ImmutableArray<T>` field/auto-property #100077
    9.0.0
  • Bad Process.StartTime in .NET Core 3.1 on macOS #66170
    9.0.0
  • [iOS] An SSL error when sending request to server with self-signed certificate #85415
  • Add 'split' support for ReadOnlySpan<char> similar to string #934
    9.0.0
  • JIT: `_Sse41_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Sse41.Program.RoundToNearestIntegerSingle()` failed in `jitpartialcompilation_pgo` for linux x64 #100245
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] RemoteExecutionException: Half-way through waiting for remote process #104366
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 24 Regressions on 1/20/2024 12:29:16 AM #97400
    9.0.0
  • .NET hangs for an unknown reason #97731
  • Failed to create generic virtual method implementation #104913
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker Test failure #96407
    9.0.0
  • [Android][AOT] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms.BuildTasks.Tests.GenerateRuntimeGraphTests failed #53999
    9.0.0
  • Inconsistency between documentation and implementation for EnumerationOptions.MaxRecursionDepth #104997
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration test fails on windows x86 leg #97255
    Future
  • [browser][WBT] SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser - NU1903 - System.Text.Json 8.0.0 #104737
    9.0.0
  • ILCompiler.Compiler.Tests.SwiftLoweringTests.VerifyLowering failing with preivew 6 #104765
    9.0.0
  • Trimmer reports IL2122 even if trim warnings are suppressed #105044
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introducing Log buffering abstraction #104129
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #105117
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Remove dead code for NetFx ASP.NET #105115
    area-System.Configuration
  • [release/9.0-preview7]Update downlevel to 8.0.8 #105114
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable AVX for Sve leg #105113
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label, arm-sve
  • [llvm 19][mini] print some info if we're about to assert that plt_entry == NULL #105112
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mini] print some info if we're about to assert because plt_entry == NULL #105111
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable QUIC & HTTP/3 tests for ARM #105109
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Improve and fix `StaysWithinManagedObject` #105108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a pass to remove unused primary IVs #105107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetUsefulGlobals #105106
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • For transition profiler callbacks, always load the thread #105104
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Convert `GetMethodFromStackTrace` to QCall #105103
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Disable verify_committed_bytes for segments #105102
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move GetMethodTable to JIT #105098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address feedback on DiagnosticId changes #105096
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • handle Unicode encoding in Console.Beep #105094
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • [NO REVIEW] Investigate Http20.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded #105081
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Expand unboxing for Nullable<> in JIT #105073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • store the WeakReference targets in static fields, so they are never freed by the GC during test run #105072
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [WASM] Update features doc #105068
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    needs-area-label
  • Update Ubuntu wasm-related versions -- release/8.0-staging #105062
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Implement GetObjectStringData #105061
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ensure that Windows is correctly saving SVE state as part of threadsuspend #105059
    area-PAL-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Change `UdpClient` constructor function #105058
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution

Merged

  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • HttpClientFactory Keyed DI APIs #104943
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Enable embedding install location options in apphost #104749
    area-Host
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Resolve some issues impacting the jitstress-isas-x86 runs #104935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip moving `BBJ_COND` jump target if fallthrough target is equally likely #105084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix LowerHWIntrinsicGetElement for xarch #104987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't throw when deserializing SettingsPropertyValue that's not byte[] #105057
    area-System.Configuration, binary-serialization
  • JIT: Skip strength reductions that are just widenings #105075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incremental builds by modifying timestamps of unchanged outputs #105091
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in callback returns #104949
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Disable manifest generation tests since they are flaky in CI #105069
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • JIT: Use conservative VNs in `StaysWithinManagedObject` #105079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant suffix from Activity.Current filename #105066
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Disable Comparer_get_Default test on win-arm64-crossgen #105089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup some DateTime related constants #105071
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Remove DbgGet*Random* macros and constant arguments #105051
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Pass a delegate into Target #105043
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Replace the bespoke OrderedDictionary with a backport of System.Collections.Generic.OrderedDictionary #105016
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix feature switch IL when feature attributes are removed #104995
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Intrinsics for blazor" #103774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable tests that use a flaky FSW in Windows #104988
    area-System.IO
  • [eventpipe][tests] Reenable eventsourceerror non-arm32 unix platforms #105033
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix conservative VN in clrjit.natvis #105078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove unnecessary argument and fix a JITDUMP format string #105074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Remove Mono LLVMJIT builds #104552
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make it possible to resolve static virtuals to unshared methods at runtime #104965
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Flaky Test] Change request to POST to avoid retry on server Shutdown #105035
    area-System.Net.Http, test-bug
  • Move the NoGC helper classification to HelperCallProperties #105040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary `SYSLIB1056` suppressions #105039
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove `GTF_IND_INVARIANT` and `GTF_IND_NONFAULTING` flags checking #104976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • remove false statement from the docs (negative values were never allowed) #105026
    documentation, area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Include new warning codes in --notrimwarn and --noaotwarn #105049
    needs-area-label
  • Remove unused GETFIELD/SETFIELD helpers #105023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • BinaryFormatter bug fix #104896
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Require package readmes for shipping packages #105019
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Remove "nuget.org" references in WBT #104806
    Security, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Define equals manually for Swift JitInterface InlineArray types. #104843
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] CLR test build fix #104946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • OpenSSL providers support #104961
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Increasing the tolerance for Mono Runtime for the flaky ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty test #104972
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonEnumMemberNameAttribute. #105032
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow explicitly implemented ISimdVector APIs to be handled as intrinsic #104983
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2497930 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Don't do aggressive block compaction too early #105041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Expose the TarEntry start of the data stream #105007
    new-api-needs-documentation, partner-impact, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix KeyAvailable and ReadKey() in ConsolePal.Windows. #104984
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #104443
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Remove unnecessary `IDE0060` suppressions #105036
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Fix passing float and uint arguments in VM #105021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix the ExposedLocalsNumbering test #105037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert Perl scripts to C# in coreclr #104867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix broken Select with error list on macOS #104915
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [mono] Issue #103365 follow-up PR #105006
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Instructions for adding a native external library dependency #105045
    area-Infrastructure
  • Emit More EventSource Data For Metrics Measurements #104993
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Added TypeSpec hierarchy to swift-bindings #2636

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement automatic finalization #2634
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • File "/home/glot/.python", line 3 input:( "ariana young") 163 56sdf_file_path = '/mnt/data/BindingDB_HostGuest_3D_202310 4.sdf' ^ SyntaxError: invalid decimal literal #42239
  • UdpClient set `ExclusiveAddressUse` fail #42231

Updated

  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Extend the `dotnet run` command discovery protocol to be settable by a Target instead of just Evaluation #42155
    9.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue on Ubuntu24.04 #40506
  • MSBuild SDK support for C++/CLI #42078
    Discussion
  • [9.0-preview.7] Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver fails with dotnet workload or build on Windows #42211
  • NullReferenceException in Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.ProjectContext after broken restore #39316
  • .NET 8 SDK stopped building projects in Linux: `You must install or update .NET to run this application` #38794
  • 'Dotnet tool restore' does not work correctly when NUGET_PACKAGES (global-packages) is set to an alternative location #11432
    8.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Onboard Installer core-sdk-tasks tests to Helix #42243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support to generate publish WebJob Run command file compatible wi… #42242
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Removed Microsoft.DotNet.Tools.Tests.Utilities #42241
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Spike #42240
  • Implement Channel Concept in dotnet test #42233
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Merged

  • Delete trn, not tmp, in cleaning up #42201
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid UsingTask when the target does not exist #42238
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard Installer EndToEnd tests to Helix #42195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42234
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable crossgen when poisoning #42228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Start generating a unified CredScan baseline for VMR #42232
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix subpath issue on SWA dev manifest #42227
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #42132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package description #42212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42224
    Branch Lockdown
  • Add BeforeMicrosoftNETSdkTargets #40344
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Go to definition is not consistent with C# compilation when a symbol is missing #74443
  • EnC: Emit System.Runtime.CompilerServices.HotReloadException #74442
  • See squigglies in #if'd code but Quick Actions don't work. #74438
    Backlog
  • TestCode classification breaks in LSP for lines that begin with whitespace #74435
  • Enabling latest-All analyzers hangs build #74434

Closed

  • Method name style is not consistent along the code #74439
  • "Unresolvable conflict" when renaming a C# 9 record property #50450
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify access to options across code style, code style fixes and feature layers #74450
  • Add more descriptive error message when editorconfig value is incorrect #74449
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup in VS generator UI code. #74448
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add monthly smoke test to release branch official builds #74447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge internal release/dev17.11 back to release/dev17.11 #74446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not load generators in VS process #74444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Document state updating #74441
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Instance extensions - flesh out code gen for iterator/async methods. #74437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support VS System theme #74432
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce allocations in AnalyzerFileReference.GetAnalyzerTypeNameMap #74411
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid shipping dependency on EA.RazorCompiler to SDK #74436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Also checking line end when block structure is filtered #74413
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove ifdefs related to formatting #74424
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address PR feedback on https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/74132 #74193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Skip TestCode classification type when computing tokens. #74433
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fill some gaps in Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #74389
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Adjust overload resolution priority from LDM #74428
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove diagnostic for 'value' as a contextual keyword #74408
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core 8 Identity Endpoints not compatible with FallbackPolicy that requires authenticated users by default #56885
  • An unhandled exception of type 'System.ArgumentException' occurred in Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.dll: 'The path must be absolute.' #56883
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #56882
  • ArgumentNullException when requesting a Razor Page #56879
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mvc #56870

Closed

  • [Epic] Improve the Data Protection experience for apps with multiple instances #53654
    9.0.0
  • Failures in Mvc.Template Tests #56828
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #56860
  • Blazor Server page with login workflow embedded within an Iframe return to login screen even after successful authentication #56874
  • ValidateAuthenticationStateAsync manual trigger #56859
  • dotnet restore >NU1301> Interruption in project build due to external dependency failure #56873
  • Allow deletion of Data Protection keys #53880

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove downlevel runtimes from SiteExtensions package #56884
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56881
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56880
    area-mvc, 8.0.x
  • Add ClaimData for AuthenticationStateData and fix overtrimming #56878
    area-blazor
  • Increase quarantine pr timeout #56871
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add an explanatory comment to DuplexPipe #56863
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Update Microsoft.IDWeb dependencies #56877
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use minified .js files from submodule in source-build #56864
    area-blazor
  • Support for Pushed Authorization (PAR) in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • mark verified files as lf and utf8 #56643
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56768
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The RealParent on XXX has been Garbage Collected #23691
  • Square brackets in WebView URL Sources result in ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND on Android #23690
  • Border on iOS redraws with 1 frame lag, creating lag before drawn 1 frame after other elements #23688
  • Remove IHybridWebView properties #23687
    9.0-preview7
  • [WinUI] CollectionView GridItemsLayout Shows 6 Columns Even When Span is Set to 7, When Display Scale is Set to 125% or 150% #23684
  • App crashes when returning to app from background [main/xamarin_main/monotouch-main/etc.) #23682
  • Memory increases when switching the tabs. #23680
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS, 9.0 Preview 6] AppShell.Navigated throws System.ArgumentException in Microsoft.Maui.FontManager #23678
  • IWKScriptMessageHandlerWithReply has a bad implementation of DidReceiveScriptMessage #23677
  • [MAUI] I1_Layout - Horizontal grid for DataTemplate page does not display four-row of grid and the content of step3. #23675
    Backlog
  • Page.IsBusy activity idicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23674
    Backlog
  • DataTrigger does not work on Mac Catalyst #23672

Closed

  • HybridWebView core features: static files and simple messages #22302
    .NET 9 Planning
  • IntuneMAMAppConfig returns NULL value in IOS MAUI application #23670
  • Remove bumptech.glide.load.data java package from maui app #23660
  • Suddenly, iOS crashes with “Model building is not supported when publishing with NativeAOT. Use a compiled model” #23653
  • Could not find Android Resource.. #19645
  • [Windows] App works in Debug and Release configurations but crashes in Microsoft Store #23652

PullRequests

Created

  • Use UIView.Window instead of the global window #23693
  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
  • [xaml] improve performance of `BindableProperty.TryConvert` #23685
    area-xaml, t/perf
  • Bring back ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #23683
    area-xaml, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when trying to access private members #23671

Merged

  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • [net9.0] Comment out shell test #23676
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [ci] Fix maestro publishing for stable packages (#23664) #23681
  • [ci] Fix maestro publishing for stable packages #23664
    area-infrastructure
  • [tests] Fix iOS screenshot for sonoma #23667
    area-testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [ci] Use drop service for SDK insertion artifacts #23658
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` #23626
    community ✨
  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area-xaml
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when referencing results of other source generators #23646
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Error: Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery. #34246
  • Mapping-aware cusom SQL #34245
  • Change of entity type from owned to non-owned does not trigger conventions #34244

Closed

  • Being able to use temp table with ef core linq query #34243

PullRequests

Merged

  • API review updates #34241
  • Revert "impements #11261 sequence cache support" for 9.0 #34240

Updated

  • Stop including the discriminator in the JSON id by default #34208
